channel.title: 🏢 Univ. Grenoble Alpes and Inria on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Univ. Grenoble Alpes and Inria on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Computing the Bias of Constant-step Stochastic Approximation with Markovian Noise
item.description: New method quantifies & reduces bias in constant-step stochastic approximation algorithms with Markovian noise, improving accuracy and efficiency.
